PageInfo.Message:
The world is divided into different areas:
Each area is named, such as "Hidell Plains,"
"Breya Coast," and "Mysree Forest."
To find out which area your destination or
current location is in, it's a good idea to
develop a habit of checking the "Map" in the game
menu called "World" (Game menu: <KC UI_GAME_MENU>)
(Map: <COL ffdc78>"World"</COL>).

Furthermore, there are quests that can be
undertaken in each area, as well as a variety of
items available in the shops and different enemies
and levels of difficulty.
By understanding the unique characteristics of
each area, you can progress in your adventure more
advantageously.
